item.description:
My daughter (age 14) and I are going up on Thursday and would love for some folks to join us. It is a ton of fun and it's supposed to be hot on Thursday, so all the better. They have water areas from infant-adult, so anyone is welcome. You can bring in coolers (just no glass items), so it helps to save $$ on food/snacks/drinks. Free parking.

Hope to see you there!

http://www.watercountry.com/

http://www.watercountry.com/_site/events.html

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Last Minute--Water Country--Kid Friendly
